name: Travel Snek
description:
Entry for the One Script Jam 2020

Arrow Keys: Move
WASD or Numpad: Chomp Wall Blocks

Travel with your Snek through the unforgiving rocky environment.
Purple blocks are Snek's Power Source and allow him to grow and use his Chomp Powers.
Chomp is only possible if Snek is long enough.

Get points for collecting power sources and travel distance.

The C#/MonoGame Sourcecode for this game is also available for download.
